title: node
text:
node

The node commandlet allows to install and setup node.js.
The arguments (devon node «args») are explained by the following table:


Table 24. Usage of devon node






Argument(s)
Meaning




setup
setup node.js (install and verify), configurable via NODE_VERSION


create «name» [«args»]
create a new devon4node application (same as devon4node new)


generate «s» [«args»]
generate devon4node components using the schematic «s» (same as devon4node generate)


db «c» [«args»]
execute a TypeORM command «c» (same as devon4node db)


cicd «args»
generate cicd files for the current devon4node project


«args»
call NodeJS with the specified arguments
